# Base (provider-agnostic) dependencies only
polars~=1.27.1
python-dateutil~=2.9.0.post0
setuptools~=78.1.0
duckdb~=1.2.2
pandas~=2.2.3
sqlglot~=26.14.0
numpy~=2.2.4
colorlog~=6.9.0
python-dotenv~=1.0.1
pyarrow>=21,<23

# NOTE:
# Redis and cloud SDKs are NOT installed by default.
# Install them via extras, e.g.:
#   pip install 'supertable[minio]'   -> minio backend + redis
#   pip install 'supertable[s3]'      -> AWS S3 backend + redis
#   pip install 'supertable[azure]'   -> Azure Blob backend + redis
#   pip install 'supertable[gcp]'     -> GCS backend + redis
#   pip install 'supertable[all-cloud]' -> all cloud backends (each brings redis)
